title: 2 BEDROOM 2 BATH / LAUNDRY IN UNIT / OPEN VIEWS / FITNESS CENTER / HOT
posting_body: ['2 BEDROOM 2 BATH / LAUNDRY IN UNIT / OPEN VIEWS / FITNESS CENTER / HOTEL AMENITIES', 'Listing ID #: 212855', 'Price: $9,970', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 2.0', 'Bathrooms: 2.0', 'Approx.', 'Size: 1,429 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Building Amenities', 'Business Center', 'Common Outdoor Space', 'Concierge', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Health Club', 'Laundry', 'Lounge', 'New Construction', 'Pool', 'Storage', 'Subway', 'Valet', 'WiFi', 'This sophisticated apartment offers you maximum convenience, whilst being bathed in luxurious finishes all around.', 'Soaring above the Manhattan landscape, you will wake up and instantly have your senses energized.', 'When you come home you will be greeted by opulence and comfort at every turn.', 'Located steps from Madison Square Park and among celebrated neighborhoods including Gramercy Park, Union Square and NoMad, you are encapsulated in a vibrant downtown lifestyle with world-class restaurants, parks, shopping, and convenient transportation options.', 'Enjoy premier recreation and relaxation facilities in this extraordinary new high-rise construction in what will be a new architectural landmark in New York City.', 'For showings contact:', 'Adel Talebpour / The Bouklis Group / 212-961-7334 (cell) / <URL> / <URL> / <URL>', 'Adel Talebpour', 'Phone: 212-402-7855', 'Mobile: 212-961-7334', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 212-402-7855 \xa0 212-961-7334 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Adel Talebpour at 212-961-7334']
